<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### getTruncStoreByteOffset() {#a862473b9c3e242287a712fdb1171ccb3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static std::optional&lt; int64&#95;t &gt; getTruncStoreByteOffset (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gstore">GStore</a> &amp; Store, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &amp; SrcVal, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp; MRI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> if the store <code>Store</code> is a truncstore that can be merged.

That is, it&#39;s a store of a shifted value of <code>SrcVal</code>. If <code>SrcVal</code> is an empty <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> then it does not need to match and SrcVal is set to the source value found. On match, returns the start byte offset of the <code>SrcVal</code> that is being stored.

Definition at line <a href="#l00649">649</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-cpp">LoadStoreOpt.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the size of memory access is unknown, do not use it to do analysis.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// One example of unknown size memory access is to load/store scalable</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vector objects on the stack.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// BasePtr1 is PtrDiff away from BasePtr0. They alias if none of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// following situations arise:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PtrDiff &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp; Size1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#a0b0401973fc9567440717a5d32a8eb8d">hasValue</a>() &amp;&amp; !Size1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#a900ef826f2fe747a00dc0bdb6b8ede87">isScalable</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#91;----BasePtr0----&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                         &#91;---BasePtr1--&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ========PtrDiff========&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">      IsAlias = !((int64&#95;t)Size1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#a935a116f6c8690449f4eddd56a99504b">getValue</a>() &lt;= PtrDiff);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PtrDiff &lt; 0 &amp;&amp; Size2.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#a0b0401973fc9567440717a5d32a8eb8d">hasValue</a>() &amp;&amp; !Size2.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#a900ef826f2fe747a00dc0bdb6b8ede87">isScalable</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                     &#91;----BasePtr0----&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#91;---BasePtr1--&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// =====(-PtrDiff)====&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">      IsAlias = !((PtrDiff + (int64&#95;t)Size2.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#a935a116f6c8690449f4eddd56a99504b">getValue</a>()) &lt;= 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If both BasePtr0 and BasePtr1 are FrameIndexes, we will not be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// able to calculate their relative offset if at least one arises</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from an alloca. However, these allocas cannot overlap and we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// can infer there is no alias.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Base0Def = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4b2430ab5e686b82f8cd6fd588d6de6f">getDefIgnoringCopies</a>(BasePtr0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/giseladdressing/baseindexoffset/#af61eff214606db73b6d5c03e9be2e750">getBase</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Base1Def = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4b2430ab5e686b82f8cd6fd588d6de6f">getDefIgnoringCopies</a>(BasePtr1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/giseladdressing/baseindexoffset/#af61eff214606db73b6d5c03e9be2e750">getBase</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Base0Def || !Base1Def)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Couldn&#39;t tell anything.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Base0Def-&gt;getOpcode() != Base1Def-&gt;getOpcode())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo">MachineFrameInfo</a> &amp;MFI = Base0Def-&gt;getMF()-&gt;getFrameInfo();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the bases have the same frame index but we couldn&#39;t find a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MUC0.BasePtr.isValid() &amp;&amp; MUC0.BasePtr == MUC1.BasePtr &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: This is way overconservative for unordered atomics (see D66309)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MUC0.IsAtomic &amp;&amp; MUC1.IsAtomic)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If one operation reads from invariant memory, and the other may store, they</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cannot alias.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MUC0.MMO &amp;&amp; MUC1.MMO) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((MUC0.MMO-&gt;isInvariant() &amp;&amp; MUC1.MMO-&gt;isStore()) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">        (MUC1.MMO-&gt;isInvariant() &amp;&amp; MUC0.MMO-&gt;isStore()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If NumBytes is scalable and offset is not 0, conservatively return may</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// alias</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((MUC0.NumBytes.isScalable() &amp;&amp; MUC0.Offset != 0) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">      (MUC1.NumBytes.isScalable() &amp;&amp; MUC1.Offset != 0))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BothNotScalable =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">      !MUC0.NumBytes.isScalable() &amp;&amp; !MUC1.NumBytes.isScalable();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to prove that there is aliasing, or that there is no aliasing. Either</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// way, we can return now. If nothing can be proved, proceed with more tests.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsAlias;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BothNotScalable &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/giseladdressing/#a140cb977d5598588fb9e0079cd1aabf9">GISelAddressing::aliasIsKnownForLoadStore</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>, IsAlias, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsAlias;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The following all rely on MMO0 and MMO1 being valid.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!MUC0.MMO || !MUC1.MMO)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: port the alignment based alias analysis from SDAG&#39;s isAlias().</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal">  int64&#95;t SrcValOffset0 = MUC0.MMO-&gt;getOffset();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal">  int64&#95;t SrcValOffset1 = MUC1.MMO-&gt;getOffset();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize">LocationSize</a> Size0 = MUC0.NumBytes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize">LocationSize</a> Size1 = MUC1.NumBytes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a> &amp;&amp; MUC0.MMO-&gt;getValue() &amp;&amp; MUC1.MMO-&gt;getValue() &amp;&amp; Size0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#a0b0401973fc9567440717a5d32a8eb8d">hasValue</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal">      Size1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#a0b0401973fc9567440717a5d32a8eb8d">hasValue</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use alias analysis information.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t MinOffset = std::min(SrcValOffset0, SrcValOffset1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t Overlap0 =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal">        Size0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#a935a116f6c8690449f4eddd56a99504b">getValue</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/details/fixedorscalablequantity/#ac4ab9dd9440c55bee1aa4a1195cee759">getKnownMinValue</a>() + SrcValOffset0 - MinOffset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t Overlap1 =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal">        Size1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#a935a116f6c8690449f4eddd56a99504b">getValue</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/details/fixedorscalablequantity/#ac4ab9dd9440c55bee1aa4a1195cee759">getKnownMinValue</a>() + SrcValOffset1 - MinOffset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize">LocationSize</a> Loc0 =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal">        Size0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#a900ef826f2fe747a00dc0bdb6b8ede87">isScalable</a>() ? Size0 : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#a131715ceeb92fb803a329d6b76d14e0d">LocationSize::precise</a>(Overlap0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize">LocationSize</a> Loc1 =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">        Size1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#a900ef826f2fe747a00dc0bdb6b8ede87">isScalable</a>() ? Size1 : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#a131715ceeb92fb803a329d6b76d14e0d">LocationSize::precise</a>(Overlap1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a>-&gt;isNoAlias(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation">MemoryLocation</a>(MUC0.MMO-&gt;getValue(), Loc0, MUC0.MMO-&gt;getAAInfo()),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation">MemoryLocation</a>(MUC1.MMO-&gt;getValue(), Loc1, MUC1.MMO-&gt;getAAInfo())))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise we have to assume they alias.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns true if the instruction creates an unavoidable hazard that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="comment">/// forces a boundary between store merge candidates.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300" lineLink="#aea277b91596b7659f1c1c102bd974f56"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#aea277b91596b7659f1c1c102bd974f56">isInstHardMergeHazard</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoadStoreOpt::mergeStores(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;GStore &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;StoresToMerge) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to merge all the stores in the vector, splitting into separate segments</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as necessary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(StoresToMerge.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() &gt; 1 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expected multiple stores to merge&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal">  LLT OrigTy = MRI-&gt;getType(StoresToMerge&#91;0&#93;-&gt;getValueReg());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="normal">  LLT PtrTy = MRI-&gt;getType(StoresToMerge&#91;0&#93;-&gt;getPointerReg());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AS = PtrTy.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#ac33fa4c8cfeb9287f51f95404a459de8">getAddressSpace</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ensure the legal store info is computed for this address space.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal">  initializeStoreMergeTargetInfo(AS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;LegalSizes = LegalStoreSizes&#91;AS&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;StoreMI : StoresToMerge)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(MRI-&gt;getType(StoreMI-&gt;getValueReg()) == OrigTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AnyMerged = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">do</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumPow2 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae22967d11b695d268992470debfae4b2">llvm::bit&#95;floor</a>(StoresToMerge.size());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxSizeBits = NumPow2 &#42; OrigTy.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#a956ffd0de93798f523683b447646dd92">getSizeInBits</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/details/fixedorscalablequantity/#a33880aaca0ad05e5f1557f079305bde5">getFixedValue</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the biggest store we can generate to handle the number of stores.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergeSizeBits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MergeSizeBits = MaxSizeBits; MergeSizeBits &gt; 1; MergeSizeBits /= 2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal">      LLT StoreTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#a67021459c7ef8f9a634b4eac7ffd0f96">LLT::scalar</a>(MergeSizeBits);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">      EVT StoreEVT =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9c2999836b5dd4ca2d272970cc0b9a0f">getApproximateEVTForLLT</a>(StoreTy, MF-&gt;getFunction().getContext());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LegalSizes.size() &gt; MergeSizeBits &amp;&amp; LegalSizes&#91;MergeSizeBits&#93; &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">          TLI-&gt;canMergeStoresTo(AS, StoreEVT, &#42;MF) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">          (TLI-&gt;isTypeLegal(StoreEVT)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We can generate a MergeSize bits store.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MergeSizeBits &lt;= OrigTy.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#a956ffd0de93798f523683b447646dd92">getSizeInBits</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AnyMerged; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// No greater merge.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumStoresToMerge = MergeSizeBits / OrigTy.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#a956ffd0de93798f523683b447646dd92">getSizeInBits</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Perform the actual merging.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;GStore &#42;, 8&gt;</a> SingleMergeStores(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">        StoresToMerge.begin(), StoresToMerge.begin() + NumStoresToMerge);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">    AnyMerged |= doSingleStoreMerge(SingleMergeStores);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">    StoresToMerge.erase(StoresToMerge.begin(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">                        StoresToMerge.begin() + NumStoresToMerge);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StoresToMerge.size() &gt; 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AnyMerged;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoadStoreOpt::isLegalOrBeforeLegalizer(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalityquery">LegalityQuery</a> &amp;Query,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">                                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Action = LI-&gt;getAction(Query).Action;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the instruction is unsupported, it can&#39;t be legalized at all.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Action == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/legalizeactions/#a834a0e3032e20fe88a0c931e8f246654a47383e4f532d33bd4f45d182896d7c17">LegalizeActions::Unsupported</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsPreLegalizer || Action == LegalizeAction::Legal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoadStoreOpt::doSingleStoreMerge(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;GStore &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;Stores) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Stores.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() &gt; 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We know that all the stores are consecutive and there are no aliasing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// operations in the range. However, the values that are being stored may be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// generated anywhere before each store. To ensure we have the values</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// available, we materialize the wide value and new store at the place of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// final store in the merge sequence.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">  GStore &#42;FirstStore = Stores&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumStores = Stores.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoadStoreOpt::processMergeCandidate(StoreMergeCandidate &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.Stores.size() &lt; 2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.reset();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Checking store merge candidate with &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.Stores.size()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; stores, starting with &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.Stores&#91;0&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We know that the stores in the candidate are adjacent.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now we need to check if any potential aliasing instructions recorded</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// during the search alias with load/stores added to the candidate after.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For example, if we have the candidate:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   C.Stores = &#91;ST1, ST2, ST3, ST4&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and after seeing ST2 we saw a load LD1, which did not alias with ST1 or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ST2, then we would have recorded it into the PotentialAliases structure</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with the associated index value of &quot;1&quot;. Then we see ST3 and ST4 and add</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// them to the candidate group. We know that LD1 does not alias with ST1 or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ST2, since we already did that check. However we don&#39;t yet know if it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// may alias ST3 and ST4, so we perform those checks now.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;GStore &#42;&gt;</a> StoresToMerge;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DoesStoreAliasWithPotential = &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Idx, GStore &amp;CheckStore) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AliasInfo : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">reverse</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.PotentialAliases)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="normal">      MachineInstr &#42;PotentialAliasOp = AliasInfo.first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PreCheckedIdx = AliasInfo.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Check if the store \\p Store is a truncstore that can be merged. That is,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><Highlight kind="comment">/// it&#39;s a store of a shifted value of \\p SrcVal. If \\p SrcVal is an empty</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> FoundSrcVal;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Match a pattern where a wide type scalar value is stored by several narrow</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><Highlight kind="comment">/// stores. Fold it into a single store or a BSWAP and a store if the targets</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><Highlight kind="comment">/// supports it.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Assuming little endian target:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><Highlight kind="comment">///  i8 &#42;p = ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><Highlight kind="comment">///  i32 val = ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><Highlight kind="comment">///  p&#91;0&#93; = (val &gt;&gt; 0) &amp; 0xFF;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><Highlight kind="comment">///  p&#91;1&#93; = (val &gt;&gt; 8) &amp; 0xFF;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><Highlight kind="comment">///  p&#91;2&#93; = (val &gt;&gt; 16) &amp; 0xFF;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><Highlight kind="comment">///  p&#91;3&#93; = (val &gt;&gt; 24) &amp; 0xFF;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><Highlight kind="comment">/// =&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><Highlight kind="comment">///  &#42;((i32)p) = val;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><Highlight kind="comment">///  i8 &#42;p = ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><Highlight kind="comment">///  i32 val = ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><Highlight kind="comment">///  p&#91;0&#93; = (val &gt;&gt; 24) &amp; 0xFF;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><Highlight kind="comment">///  p&#91;1&#93; = (val &gt;&gt; 16) &amp; 0xFF;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><Highlight kind="comment">///  p&#91;2&#93; = (val &gt;&gt; 8) &amp; 0xFF;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><Highlight kind="comment">///  p&#91;3&#93; = (val &gt;&gt; 0) &amp; 0xFF;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><Highlight kind="comment">/// =&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><Highlight kind="comment">///  &#42;((i32)p) = BSWAP(val);</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoadStoreOpt::mergeTruncStore(GStore &amp;StoreMI,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   SmallPtrSetImpl&lt;GStore &#42;&gt; &amp;DeletedStores) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><Highlight kind="normal">  LLT MemTy = StoreMI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gmemoperation/#a130e12a0a8b3fe8149fe7b5eecfa603e">getMMO</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#a3e9d2a9063bce7f5b3d7dd21fd05c79d">getMemoryType</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We only handle merging simple stores of 1-4 bytes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!MemTy.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#a3989251b1a714fc8296685f77eac6e87">isScalar</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MemTy.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#a956ffd0de93798f523683b447646dd92">getSizeInBits</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 8:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 16:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 32:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!StoreMI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gmemoperation/#ae8c1a69379306b47f0302688d3427b60">isSimple</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We do a simple search for mergeable stores prior to this one.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Any potential alias hazard along the way terminates the search.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;GStore &#42;&gt;</a> FoundStores;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We&#39;re looking for:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1) a (store(trunc(...)))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2) of an LSHR/ASHR of a single wide value, by the appropriate shift to get</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    the partial value stored.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 3) where the offsets form either a little or big-endian sequence.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> BaseReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Reset counter since we&#39;ve found a matching inst.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><Highlight kind="normal">    NumInstsChecked = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FoundStores.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() == NumStoresRequired)</Highlight></CodeLine>
